焪字的基本解释

焪
qióng
尽。
曝晒。

焪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qióng］
［《廣韻》去仲切，去送，溪。］
亦作“熍1”。
(1)干；火烘干物。
(2)曝晒。
(3)灰烬。

焪字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　焪； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页674第15
【廣韻】【集韻】?去仲切，音䛪。【玉篇】盡也，乾也。【廣韻】火乾物也。　又【廣韻】去宮切【集韻】丘弓切，?音穹。【廣韻】乾也。【集韻】曝也，燼也。或作熍。

焪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
焪字的起名意思

暂无。

焪
Basic explanation of words
焪
qióng
Exhausted.
Exposure.
焪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qióng］
["Guangyun" go to Zhongqi, go to send, Xi. ]
Also known as "熍1".
(1) Dry; fire-dried things.
(2) Exposure.
(3) Ashes.
焪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　焪; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 674 15
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Go to Zhongqi, the sound. [Jade articles] Do it, do it. [Guangyun] Fire dry things too.　[Guang Yun] Go to the palace to cut [Ji Yun] Qiu bow cut, sound dome. [Guang Yun] Do it too. [Jiyun] Expose Ye, Jin Ye. Or make 熍.
